@ Kenmurton, i will try to compress the whole thing into a .rar file. The new torrent will be launched soon. I will link it in the Description from this torrent.

@Nish_88. This is the MS Windows 7 Professional x86 English RTM (final) edition, Build 6.1.7600 (Win7 RTM) available from MSDN. 
If you want to install Windows 7 Ultimate, you must do so from launching the Installer from your current Vista Ultimate system. Otherwise it is not possible. If you Boot from an DVD or USB Drive it will always install as an Professional edition.
Also the torrent speed is limited to the speed of your i-net connection and the upload from the seeders, in case you use all the bandwidth for this torrent the download shouldn't be a problem.
You're welcome :)
